title: 110_hr368
content: Notch Fairness Act of 2007 - Amends title II of the Social Security Act with respect to the benefit computation formula for individuals affected by the changes in benefit computation rules enacted in the Social Security Amendments of 1977 who became eligible for old-age insurance benefits after 1978 and before 1989 . Sets forth a schedule of additional benefit increases for such beneficiaries , with percentages declining from 55 to 5 keyed to the year an individual became eligible for benefits between 1978 and 1989. Provides for an election to receive such payments in a lump sum.
